channel.title: Posts on AWS Insiders
channel.description: Recent content in Posts on AWS Insiders

item.title: 5 Tools I Actually Use as a Cloud Technical Account Manager
item.description:
Working in the cloud every day, these are the tools I personally use and recommend.

1. AWS Certified Solutions Architect Official Study Guide

Helped me pass my cert. Covers real-world scenarios and test-style questions.

2. Anker USB-C Dock

I use this daily for dual monitors, network, and charging from a single cable.

3. Blue Yeti USB Microphone

For clear Zoom audio in support calls and recordings.

Affiliate Disclosure: As an Amazon Associate, I earn from qualifying purchases. I only recommend tools I personally use or believe in.

item.title: Welcome to AWS Insiders
item.description:
Thanks for stopping by! AWS Insiders is a growing collection of tools, posts, and technical guides based on real-world experience in cloud, voice, and network engineering.

Here you’ll find:

  • Cloud automation tools
  • Hands-on AWS guides
  • Observability and support tips
  • Behind-the-scenes insights from an active TAM

New content is added regularly, so check back soon or follow me on GitHub and LinkedIn for updates.

Let’s build something better in the cloud — together.
